sprint_goal: Establish the foundational monorepo structure and provision all core AWS infrastructure (Networking, Database, App Hosting, Identity) via Terraform.
Implement the full CI/CD pipeline and the complete user registration flow, enabling automated deployments and account creation.
Deliver the user login flow and the core calculator functionality, including basic arithmetic, angle modes, and SI prefix input.
Implement critical user features: trigonometric functions, the Ohm's Law calculator, secure account deletion, and offline support for the core calculator.
Launch the User-Extensible Custom Modes feature by delivering the creation wizard and secure execution engine, and implement the in-app help system.
